trans-unit.source: Creates a menuitem control for the tray.

seg-source.mrk: Creates a menuitem control for the tray.

target.mrk: Creates a menuitem control for the tray.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Allows you to create a submenu in the referenced menu. If equal -1 it will be added 'behind' the last created item (default setting).

seg-source.mrk: Allows you to create a submenu in the referenced menu.
If equal -1 it will be added 'behind' the last created item (default setting).

target.mrk: Allows you to create a submenu in the referenced menu.
If equal -1 it will be added 'behind' the last created item (default setting).

trans-unit.source: [optional] Allows you to define the entry number to be created. The entries are numbered starting at 0. If equal -1 it will be added 'behind' the last created entry (default setting).

seg-source.mrk: Allows you to define the entry number to be created.
The entries are numbered starting at 0.
If equal -1 it will be added 'behind' the last created entry (default setting).

target.mrk: Allows you to define the entry number to be created.
The entries are numbered starting at 0.
If equal -1 it will be added 'behind' the last created entry (default setting).

trans-unit.source: the identifier (controlID) of the new tray menuitem.

seg-source.mrk: the identifier (controlID) of the new tray menuitem.

target.mrk: the identifier (controlID) of the new tray menuitem.

trans-unit.source: If the 'text' parameter is an empty string ( "" ) then a separator line is created.

seg-source.mrk: If the 'text' parameter is an empty string ( "" ) then a separator line is created.

target.mrk: If the 'text' parameter is an empty string ( "" ) then a separator line is created.

trans-unit.source: By default, normal checked menuitems (not radio menuitems) will be automatically unchecked if you click it!

seg-source.mrk: By default, normal checked menuitems (not radio menuitems) will be automatically unchecked if you click it!

target.mrk: By default, normal checked menuitems (not radio menuitems) will be automatically unchecked if you click it!

trans-unit.source: To turn off this behaviour use Opt("TrayMenuMode", 2).

seg-source.mrk: To turn off this behaviour use Opt("TrayMenuMode", 2).

target.mrk: To turn off this behaviour use Opt("TrayMenuMode", 2).

trans-unit.source: Radio menuitems are automatically grouped together and these groups are separated by a separator line or a normal item which is not a radio item.

seg-source.mrk: Radio menuitems are automatically grouped together and these groups are separated by a separator line or a normal item which is not a radio item.

target.mrk: Radio menuitems are automatically grouped together and these groups are separated by a separator line or a normal item which is not a radio item.

trans-unit.source: By default, a clicked radio menuitem will be checked automatically and all other radio items in the same group will be unchecked!

seg-source.mrk: By default, a clicked radio menuitem will be checked automatically and all other radio items in the same group will be unchecked!

target.mrk: By default, a clicked radio menuitem will be checked automatically and all other radio items in the same group will be unchecked!

trans-unit.source: To turn off this behaviour use Opt("TrayMenuMode", 8).

seg-source.mrk: To turn off this behaviour use Opt("TrayMenuMode", 8).

target.mrk: To turn off this behaviour use Opt("TrayMenuMode", 8).

trans-unit.source: The default tray menu items will not be shown and items are not checked when selected. These are options 1 and 2 for TrayMenuMode.

seg-source.mrk: The default tray menu items will not be shown and items are not checked when selected.
These are options 1 and 2 for TrayMenuMode.

target.mrk: The default tray menu items will not be shown and items are not checked when selected.
These are options 1 and 2 for TrayMenuMode.

trans-unit.source: Create a tray item with the radio item parameter selected.

seg-source.mrk: Create a tray item with the radio item parameter selected.

target.mrk: Create a tray item with the radio item parameter selected.

trans-unit.source: Display a message box about the AutoIt version and installation path of the AutoIt executable.

seg-source.mrk: Display a message box about the AutoIt version and installation path of the AutoIt executable.

target.mrk: Display a message box about the AutoIt version and installation path of the AutoIt executable.

trans-unit.source: Find the folder of a full path.

seg-source.mrk: Find the folder of a full path.

target.mrk: Find the folder of a full path.
